A treatise of nature and grace to which is added, the author's idæa of providence, and his answers to several objections against the foregoing discourse / by the author of The search after truth ; translated from the last edition, enlarged by many explications. Traité de la nature et de la grace. English Malebranche, Nicolas, 1638-1715.
[8], 280 p.
Printed and are to be sold by John Whitlock ..., London : 1695.
Errata: prelim. p. [8]. Marginal notes. With ms. notes by William R. Williams. Translation of Traité de la nature et de la grace. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
=======
